vsParam:
I was thinking earlier,
what should we do to improve our relationship with Logy?

Speaking of Logy, he barely goes out lately. He has been
staying in the Academy for a long time because of work.

That's harmful to both his physical and mental health.
Alright! Let's take him out and chat!

So, Logy!
Let's go take a walk!
I thought you were up to something serious...

I don't like going out.
It's OK for me to stay put on campus...

What? Oh!? Wait.
[px]! Don't drag my clothes!

I told you, it's OK for me to stay...
W-wait! Don't push me!
Alright~ We're taking Logy out for a walk~!
What a nice day. We can all have a good mood after the walk!
Let's also eat something on the way ♪

Hey, wait!
You can't do this. This is not OK!

Shush, be quiet!
There's a monster ahead.

Ah, th-there's really... a monster. Is it taking a walk too?
I'm just kidding...

Anyway, let's quietly walk away and don't disturb it.
Quietly...

Cresson, your moron!
Such a big noise, it will notice us!

... I guess we cannot avoid this battle, can we?
It's coming! Watch out!

Guys, I'm sorry.
It's all my fault...

Never mind. We have killed the monster!
Let's take a rest, and continue our walk!

Logy, although you don't go out much,
you seem to be very familiar with fighting monsters?
Are you hiding something from us?

No, I'm not hiding anything.
Did I tell you about that?

Before going to Colseit, I worked in the "Central Government",
where all work besides synthesis is done via division and cooperation.

Back then,
I didn't need to gather or fight...

But soon after, I was assigned to work for the development
team of Colseit, where I had to do everything myself.

Gradually,
I also got used to battles.

I see... So you didn't receive any formal training?
As far as I see it, you are really gifted, Logy!

I'm sure you'll become stronger if you accept some formal
training! How's that? Would you like to join the Guard?

No, just join the Guard!
You and I can become the strongest knights together!

Ah, I'm still an alchemist...
I'm sorry, but I have to turn you down. Ha ha ha...

Gee! You are way too enthusiastic, Cresson!
You scared Logy!

After all, Tandrion is the captain of the Guard...
You just made the right choice, ha ha ha...
